member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES
member.summary: Specifies the capabilities or privileges requested by a package.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_INTERNET_CLIENT
member.summary: Your Internet connection for outgoing connections to the Internet.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_INTERNET_CLIENT_SERVER
member.summary: Your Internet connection, including incoming unsolicited connections from the Internet – the app can send information to or from your computer through a firewall. You do not need to declare APPX_CAPABILITY_INTERNET_CLIENT if this capability is declared.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_PRIVATE_NETWORK_CLIENT_SERVER
member.summary: A home or work network – the app can send information to or from your computer and other computers on the same network.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_DOCUMENTS_LIBRARY
member.summary: Your documents library, including the capability to add, change, or delete files. The package can access only file types that it has declared in the manifest. The app cannot access document libraries on HomeGroup computers.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_PICTURES_LIBRARY
member.summary: Your pictures library, including the capability to add, change, or delete files. This capability also includes pictures libraries on HomeGroup computers, along with picture file types on locally connected media servers.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_VIDEOS_LIBRARY
member.summary: Your videos library, including the capability to add, change, or delete files. This capability also includes videos libraries on HomeGroup computers, along with video file types on locally connected media servers.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_MUSIC_LIBRARY
member.summary: Your music library and playlists, including the capability to add, change, or delete files. This capability also includes music libraries and playlists in the music library on HomeGroup computers, plus music file types on locally connected media servers.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_ENTERPRISE_AUTHENTICATION
member.summary: Your Windows credentials, for access to a corporate intranet. This application can impersonate you on the network.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_SHARED_USER_CERTIFICATES
member.summary: Software and hardware certificates or a smart card – used to identify you in the app. This capability may be used by your employer, bank, or government services to identify you.

member.name: APPX_CAPABILITIES.APPX_CAPABILITY_REMOVABLE_STORAGE
member.summary: Removable storage, such as an external hard drive or USB flash drive, or MTP portable device, including the capability to add, change, or delete specific files. This package can only access file types that it has declared in the manifest.
